title: CRM Contact
description: CRM Contact Field Schema for AG-L56V52BMMW

standard__contact_fbclid.description: Facebook click ID used to create the contact
standard__contact_fbclid.title: FBCLID

standard__contact_gclid.description: Google click ID used to create the contact
standard__contact_gclid.title: GCLID

standard__contact_last_campaign_email_bo.description: Last campaign email bounced for the contact
standard__contact_last_campaign_email_bo.title: Last campaign email bounced date

standard__contact_last_campaign_email_cl.description: Last campaign email clicked date for the contact
standard__contact_last_campaign_email_cl.title: Last campaign email clicked date

standard__contact_last_campaign_email_op.description: Last campaign email open date for the contact
standard__contact_last_campaign_email_op.title: Last campaign email open date

standard__contact_last_campaign_email_se.description: Last campaign email sent for the contact
standard__contact_last_campaign_email_se.title: Last campaign email sent date

standard__contact_last_campaign_email_se.description: Name of last campaign email sent for the contact
standard__contact_last_campaign_email_se.title: Last campaign email sent name

standard__contact_last_campaign_sms_deli.description: Last campaign SMS delivered date for the contact
standard__contact_last_campaign_sms_deli.title: Last campaign SMS delivered date

standard__contact_last_campaign_sms_fail.description: Last campaign SMS failed date for the contact
standard__contact_last_campaign_sms_fail.title: Last campaign SMS failed date

standard__contact_last_campaign_sms_sent.description: Last campaign SMS sent date for the contact
standard__contact_last_campaign_sms_sent.title: Last campaign SMS sent date

standard__contact_last_campaign_sms_sent.description: Name of last campaign SMS sent to the contact
standard__contact_last_campaign_sms_sent.title: Last campaign SMS sent name

standard__contact_last_campaign_sms_unde.description: Last campaign SMS undelivered date for the contact
standard__contact_last_campaign_sms_unde.title: Last campaign SMS undelivered date

standard__contact_last_contact_date.description: Date of last contact with the contact
standard__contact_last_contact_date.title: Last contact date

standard__contact_last_engagement_date.description: Date of last engagement with the contact
standard__contact_last_engagement_date.title: Last engagement date

standard__contact_last_sales_email_recei.description: Date of last sales email received for the contact
standard__contact_last_sales_email_recei.title: Last sales email received date

standard__contact_last_sales_email_sent_.description: Date of last sales email sent for the contact
standard__contact_last_sales_email_sent_.title: Last sales email sent date

standard__contact_lead_quality.description: The calculated lead quality of the contact.
standard__contact_lead_quality.title: Lead quality

standard__contact_lead_score.description: The calculated lead score of the contact.
standard__contact_lead_score.title: Lead score

standard__contact_lifecycle_stage.description: Lifecycle stage of the contact. E.g. 'Lead'
standard__contact_lifecycle_stage.title: Lifecycle stage

standard__contact_linkedin_url.description: URL of the contact's LinkedIn profile.
standard__contact_linkedin_url.title: LinkedIn URL

standard__contact_marketing_email_consen.description: The source that updated the marketing email consent field.
standard__contact_marketing_email_consen.title: Marketing email consent source

standard__contact_marketing_email_consen.description: The current status for the contact marketing email consent, i.e: "Subscribed", "Unsubscribed", or unset.
standard__contact_marketing_email_consen.title: Marketing email consent

standard__contact_marketing_email_consen.description: The timestamp in which the marketing email consent was updated.
standard__contact_marketing_email_consen.title: Marketing email consent timestamp

standard__contact_message.description: Message sent from Contact. Commonly input by the contact themselves on an intake form.
standard__contact_message.title: Message

standard__contact_mobile_phone_number.description: Additional phone number of the contact.
standard__contact_mobile_phone_number.title: Additional phone number

standard__contact_msclkid.description: Microsoft click ID used to create the contact
standard__contact_msclkid.title: MSCLKID

standard__contact_next_task_due_date.description: Date indicating when the next task of the contact is due for completion
standard__contact_next_task_due_date.title: Next task due date

standard__contact_next_task_id.description: ID of the next task of the contact
standard__contact_next_task_id.title: Next task ID

standard__contact_original_source_drill_.description: Lead attribution original source drill down level 1
standard__contact_original_source_drill_.title: Original source drill down 1

standard__contact_original_source_drill_.description: Lead attribution original source drill down level 2
standard__contact_original_source_drill_.title: Original source drill down 2

standard__contact_pipeline_id.description: The pipeline ID that is associated with the contact.
standard__contact_pipeline_id.title: Pipeline ID

standard__contact_primary_company_id.description: The primary company associated with the contact.
standard__contact_primary_company_id.title: Primary Company

standard__contact_primary_location_city_.description: City or locality of the contact's primary location.
standard__contact_primary_location_city_.title: City/locality

standard__contact_primary_location_count.description: Country of the contact's primary location.
standard__contact_primary_location_count.title: Country

standard__contact_primary_location_state.description: State, province, or region of the contact's primary location.
standard__contact_primary_location_state.title: State/province/region

standard__contact_primary_location_stree.description: Street address line 1 of the contact's primary location.
standard__contact_primary_location_stree.title: Street address line 1

standard__contact_primary_location_stree.description: Street address line 2 of the contact's primary location.
standard__contact_primary_location_stree.title: Street address line 2

standard__contact_primary_location_zip_p.description: Zip or postal code of the contact's primary location.
standard__contact_primary_location_zip_p.title: Zip/postal code

standard__contact_sms_consent_source.description: The source that updated the SMS consent field.
standard__contact_sms_consent_source.title: SMS consent source

standard__contact_sms_consent_status.description: The current status for the contact SMS consent, i.e: "Subscribed", "Unsubscribed", or unset.
standard__contact_sms_consent_status.title: SMS consent

standard__contact_source_drill_1.description: Lead attribution record source drill down level 1
standard__contact_source_drill_1.title: Record source drill down 1

standard__contact_source_drill_2.description: Lead attribution record source drill down level 2
standard__contact_source_drill_2.title: Record source drill down 2

standard__contact_source_name.description: Name of the app or external system that created the contact. E.g. 'Salesforce', 'Hubspot', 'Gmail'
standard__contact_source_name.title: Record source

standard__contact_timezone.description: Timezone of the contact. This is a string representing the timezone like 'America/New_York'.
standard__contact_timezone.title: Timezone

standard__contact_utm_campaign.description: The campaign of the UTM parameters for the contact. E.g. 'summer_sale', 'winter_sale', 'spring_sale', 'fall_sale', 'black_friday', 'cyber_monday', 'christmas', 'new_year', 'valentines', 'easter', 'mothers_day', 'fathers_day', 'back_to_school', 'halloween', 'thanksgiving', 'other'
standard__contact_utm_campaign.title: UTM Campaign

standard__contact_utm_content.description: The content of the UTM parameters for the contact. E.g. 'banner', 'sidebar', 'footer', 'header', 'popup', 'overlay', 'slider', 'carousel', 'video', 'audio', 'image', 'text', 'cta', 'form', 'other'
standard__contact_utm_content.title: UTM Content

standard__contact_utm_medium.description: The medium of the UTM parameters for the contact. E.g. 'cpc', 'email', 'social', 'organic', 'referral', 'affiliate', 'display', 'video', 'audio', 'sms', 'direct', 'other'
standard__contact_utm_medium.title: UTM Medium

standard__contact_utm_source.description: The source of the UTM parameters for the contact. E.g. 'google', 'facebook', 'twitter', 'linkedin', 'instagram', 'pinterest', 'youtube', 'tiktok', 'snapchat', 'whatsapp', 'messenger', 'email', 'sms', 'direct', 'other'
standard__contact_utm_source.title: UTM Source

standard__contact_utm_term.description: The term of the UTM parameters for the contact. E.g. 'running+shoes', 'black+friday+sale', 'cyber+monday+sale', 'christmas+gifts', 'new+year+resolutions', 'valentines+gifts', 'easter+sale', 'mothers+day+gifts', 'fathers+day+gifts', 'back+to+school+sale', 'halloween+sale', 'thanksgiving+sale', 'other'
standard__contact_utm_term.title: UTM Term

standard__sms_consent_timestamp.description: The timestamp in which the SMS consent was updated.
standard__sms_consent_timestamp.title: SMS consent timestamp

standard__tags.description: Descriptive keywords that help you find and segment contacts.
standard__tags.title: Tags

system__contact_external_id.description: External identifier for the record, optional
system__contact_external_id.title: External ID

system__contact_group_id.description: Market ID for the record, optional. Used for grouping records together, and authorization where users are restricted to selected markets.
system__contact_group_id.title: Market ID

system__contact_last_activity_date.description: Date and time of last activity
system__contact_last_activity_date.title: Last activity date

system__contact_updated.description: When the record was last updated
system__contact_updated.title: Updated date
